key.name: zoom-in-button
key.description: Mouse button shortcut to invoke zooming in.

key.name: zoom-in-key
key.description: Key shortcut to invoke zooming in.

key.name: zoom-out-button
key.description: Mouse button shortcut to invoke zooming out.

key.name: zoom-out-key
key.description: Key shortcut to invoke zooming in.

key.name: zoom-box-button
key.description: Define a rectangle area and zoom into it.

key.name: zoom-box-outline-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the zoom box outline.

key.name: zoom-box-fill-color
key.description: Fill color and opacity of the zoom box.

key.name: center-mouse-key
key.description: Puts the mouse in the middle of the screen (Regardless of zoom level)

key.name: zoom-specific-1-key
key.description: Zoom to the specific zoom level 1

key.name: zoom-spec1
key.description: Zoom level to go to when triggering hotkey 1 (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: zoom-specific-2-key
key.description: Zoom to the specific zoom level 2

key.name: zoom-spec2
key.description: Zoom level to go to when triggering hotkey 2 (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: zoom-specific-3-key
key.description: Zoom to the specific zoom level 3

key.name: zoom-spec3
key.description: Zoom level to go to when triggering hotkey 3 (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: spec-target-focus
key.summary: Target Focused Window on Specific level
key.description: Enable this to target the focused window when jumping to a specific zoom level. Disable to target mouse.

key.name: lock-zoom-key
key.description: Toggles a lock on the zoom area so it doesn't change on various events

key.name: pan-left-key
key.description: Pan (move) the zoom area left

key.name: pan-right-key
key.description: Pan (move) the zoom area right

key.name: pan-up-key
key.description: Pan (move) the zoom area up

key.name: pan-down-key
key.description: Pan (move) the zoom area down

key.name: fit-to-zoom-key
key.summary: Fit the window to the zoom level
key.description: Resize the window so it matches the current zoom level.

key.name: fit-to-window-key
key.description: Zooms in/out so the focused window is zoomed to the maximum while still being fully visible.

key.name: zoom-factor
key.description: Zoom in/out by this factor. Higher value means quicker zooming. (1.01 - 3)

key.name: minimum-zoom
key.description: The minimum allowed zoom factor. A value of 0.5 equals 2x zoom, a value of 0.25 equals 4x zoom. (0.000001 - 0.999999)

key.name: zoom-mode
key.description: How the cursor should be tracked when zooming (0 = Sync Mouse, 1 = Pan Area)

key.name: scale-mouse
key.description: Enable this to get a gradually larger mouse pointer as you zoom in

key.name: scale-mouse-dynamic
key.description: When scaling the mouse pointer, this option makes the scale adjust according to the current level of zoom.

key.name: scale-mouse-static
key.description: When not using a dynamic mouse pointer scale, this is the scale factor for the mouse pointer. (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: hide-original-mouse
key.description: Hides the original mouse pointer when zoomed in and scaling the mouse

key.name: restrain-mouse
key.summary: Restrain the mouse to the zoom area
key.description: Attempt to keep the zoomed mouse visible by warping it when it is moved outside the zoom area.

key.name: restrain-margin
key.description: The size of the margin to add when attempting to restrain the mouse. (0 - 50)

key.name: pan-factor
key.description: Move the zoomed area this much whenever you pan the zoomed area with keys. (0.001 - 1.0)

key.name: follow-focus
key.description: Move the zoom area when focus changes.

key.name: focus-fit-window
key.summary: Fit zoom level to window on focus change
key.description: Fit the zoomed area to the window when the zoomed area moves as a result of focus tracking.

key.name: autoscale-min
key.description: Only change zoom level (scale) on focus change if the target value is higher than this. Prevents zooming too far in on small popups etc. (0.000001 - 0.999999)

key.name: always-focus-fit-window
key.summary: Always fit to window on focus track
key.description: Fit the zoomed area to the window when the zoomed area moves as a result of focus tracking. Even when not initially zoomed in.

key.name: follow-focus-delay
key.description: Only attempt to center newly focused windows if the mouse hasn't moved in this amount of seconds. Use this to avoid jumping when using sloppy focus. (0 - 15)

key.name: speed
key.description: Zoom Speed (0.1 - 100)

key.name: timestep
key.description: Zoom Timestep (0.1 - 50)
